meanings.definition: To express good wishes or congratulations.
meanings.sent1: She felicitates her friend on winning the competition.
meanings.sent2: The mayor felicitates the students for their academic achievements.
meanings.sent3: The whole town felicitates the new parents on their baby's arrival.
meanings.sent4: His warm smile felicitates everyone he meets.
meanings.sent5: The heartfelt card felicitates the recipient on their special day.

meanings.definition: To make happy or bring joy to.
meanings.sent1: The surprise party felicitates her on her birthday.
meanings.sent2: Music always felicitates her during tough times.
meanings.sent3: The delicious cake felicitates the guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter felicitates the room with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful sunset felicitates everyone with its stunning colors.
